com.panviva.util.pgc.dom.processing.transforms

Class CopyAdjacentTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.panviva.util.pgc.dom.processing.Transformer
      • com.panviva.util.pgc.dom.processing.transforms.CopyTransformer
        • com.panviva.util.pgc.dom.processing.transforms.CopyAdjacentTransformer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITransform

    public class CopyAdjacentTransformer
extends CopyTransformer
    This transform copies nodes from a list of source node locations to adjacent (or nearby) target node locations. The copied nodes can be placed before or after the target node as siblings or appended as a child to the target node. The transform accommodates 1:1 child node copies to N target adjacent node(s). The number of source nodes must be identical to the number of target nodes.
    Author:
    jcharles

        public boolean isValidOperation(java.lang.String srcClass,
                                java.lang.String targetClass,
                                TaskType operation)
                         throws org.docx4j.openpackaging.exceptions.InvalidOperationException
        This method defines all the rules driving what is allowed when performing an adjacent copy of child element content from a source node to a nearby target node for each occurrence of the source nodes
